channel.title: Admin only items and stat boost?
channel.description: well my level 103 runescape account was hacked so im comin back to mopar. but now i got a new source and ive been trying others but i cant get armadyl to be admin only and have a stat boost. i always like 100 errors then i take it out and i gte no error. can somone post what i would need to put and were i need to put it to make armadyl admin only with a big stat boost? thanks a lot.

item.title: Admin only items and stat boost?
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_A_N_E_W_B I AM A N E W B
item.description:
@I_AM_A_N_E_W_B wrote:

[quote=“Carson, post:4, topic:164596”]Thanks for correcting my typo. ++

I still see that you are getting massed repped. Sad. Reported.[/quote]
LOL you are funny but ok. Report me for nothing I guess lol.

item.title: Admin only items and stat boost?
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_A_N_E_W_B I AM A N E W B
item.description:
@I_AM_A_N_E_W_B wrote:

[quote=“Carson, post:2, topic:164596”]For a “Stat Boost…”

Go to item .java

Look for the item ID.

Change the second to last number in the row to however much strength bonus you want the wep to have. Change the others for Range bonus, Attack Bonus, Mage bonus, and so on.[/quote]
Wrong. Go into item.cfg and you will find the bonuses there.

Read full topic
item.source: Admin only items and stat boost?

item.title: Admin only items and stat boost?
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

For a “Stat Boost…”

Go to item .Cfg <I had .java, but someone corrected my typo. Gf2me.

Look for the item ID.

Change the second to last number in the row to however much strength bonus you want the wep to have. Change the others for Range bonus, Attack Bonus, Mage bonus, and so on.

Read full topic
